rain_anomaly_1month.title: 1-month rainfall anomaly
rain_anomaly_1month.legend_text: Monthly precipitation anomaly compared to the long term average. Derived from CHIRPS (UCSB Climate Hazards Group). https://www.chc.ucsb.edu/data/chirps

rain_anomaly_3month.title: 3-month rainfall anomaly
rain_anomaly_3month.legend_text: 3-month precipitation anomaly compared to the long term average. Derived from CHIRPS (UCSB Climate Hazards Group). https://www.chc.ucsb.edu/data/chirps

rain_anomaly_6month.title: 6-month rainfall anomaly
rain_anomaly_6month.legend_text: 6-month precipitation anomaly compared to the long term average. Derived from CHIRPS (UCSB Climate Hazards Group). https://www.chc.ucsb.edu/data/chirps

rain_anomaly_9month.title: 9-month rainfall anomaly
rain_anomaly_9month.legend_text: 9-month precipitation anomaly compared to the long term average. Derived from CHIRPS (UCSB Climate Hazards Group). https://www.chc.ucsb.edu/data/chirps

rain_anomaly_1year.title: 1-year rainfall anomaly
rain_anomaly_1year.legend_text: 1-year precipitation anomaly compared to the long term average. Derived from CHIRPS (UCSB Climate Hazards Group). https://www.chc.ucsb.edu/data/chirps

days_dry.title: Number of dry days
days_dry.legend_text: Number of consecutive days with less than 2 mm precipitation in the last 30 days

streak_dry_days.title: Longest number of consecutive dry days
streak_dry_days.legend_text: Longest number of consecutive days with less than 2 mm precipitation in the last 30 days

days_heavy_rain.title: Number of days with heavy rainfall in the last 30 days
days_heavy_rain.legend_text: Total number of heavy rain days (rainfall > 75th percentile) within last 30 days of dekad

days_intense_rain.title: Number of days with intense rainfall in the last 30 days
days_intense_rain.legend_text: Total number of heavy rain days (rainfall > 90th percentile) within last 30 days of dekad

days_extreme_rain.title: Number of days with extreme rainfall in the last 30 days
days_extreme_rain.legend_text: Total number of heavy rain days (rainfall > 95th percentile) within last 30 days of dekad

streak_heavy_rain.title: Longest consecutive number of days with heavy rainfall in the last 30 days
streak_heavy_rain.legend_text: Longest consecutive number of heavy rain days (rainfall > 75th percentile) within last 30 days of dekad

ndvi_dekad_5.title: 10-day NDVI (MODIS)
ndvi_dekad_5.legend_text: Normalized Difference Vegetation Index (NDVI) derived from MODIS TERRA/AQUA

ndvi_dekad_1.title: 10-day NDVI 1km (MODIS)
ndvi_dekad_1.legend_text: Normalized Difference Vegetation Index (NDVI) derived from MODIS TERRA/AQUA

lst_amplitude.title: Land Surface Temperature - 10-day Amplitude (MODIS)
lst_amplitude.legend_text: Land Surface Temperature Amplitude refers to the difference between the maximum and minimum temperature in degrees Celsius

ast_max.title: INAM blended air temperature daily max (10-day)

ast_max_anomaly.title: INAM blended air temperature max anomaly (10-day)

lst_daytime_blended.title: INAM blended temperature estimates (10-day)
lst_daytime_blended.legend_text: Local station data from INAM blended with MODIS daytime land surface temperature estimates

lst_day_anomaly_blended.title: INAM blended temperature anomaly (10-day)
lst_day_anomaly_blended.legend_text: Temperature anomaly based on long term average compared to local station data from INAM blended with MODIS daytime land surface temperature estimates

precip_blended_dekad.title: INAM blended rainfall estimates (10-day)
precip_blended_dekad.legend_text: Local station data from INAM blended with CHIRP rainfall estimates

precip_blended_dekad_anomaly.title: INAM blended rainfall anomaly (10-day)
precip_blended_dekad_anomaly.legend_text: Rainfall anomaly based on long term averaged from local station data from INAM blended with CHIRP rainfall estimates

precip_blended_dekad_agg.title: INAM blended monthly aggregate rainfall
precip_blended_dekad_agg.legend_text: Monthly aggregate rainfall based on local station data from INAM blended with CHIRP estimates

spi_1m.title: SPI - 1-month
spi_1m.legend_text: 1-month Standardized Precipitation Index calculated from dekadal CHIRPS data

spi_3m.title: SPI - 3-month
spi_3m.legend_text: 3-month Standardized Precipitation Index calculated from dekadal CHIRPS data

spi_6m.title: SPI - 6-month
spi_6m.legend_text: 6-month Standardized Precipitation Index calculated from dekadal CHIRPS data

spi_9m.title: SPI - 9-month
spi_9m.legend_text: 9-month Standardized Precipitation Index calculated from dekadal CHIRPS data

spi_1y.title: SPI - 1-year
spi_1y.legend_text: 1-year Standardized Precipitation Index calculated from dekadal CHIRPS data

adamts_buffers.title: Tropical Storms - Wind buffers
adamts_buffers.legend_text: Wind buffers (radii) estimate potential wind speeds along the path of a storm with a buffer estimating the area exposed to each wind speed category. Source: GDACS

adamts_nodes.title: Tropical Storms - Nodes
adamts_nodes.legend_text: Nodes visualize estimated maximum wind speed along a storm's path at various points in time. Source: GDACS

adamts_tracks.title: Tropical Storms - Tracks
adamts_tracks.legend_text: Tracks visualize the projected path of a storm based on the forecasted position of it's center at various points in time. Source: GDACS

ipc_pop_ph3_current.title: Number of people currently in IPC Phase 3+
ipc_pop_ph3_current.legend_text: Number of people in IPC phase 3 or higher November 2021 – March 2022. Source: National IPC Technical Working Group

ipc_pop_ph3_projected.title: Number of people projected in IPC Phase 3+
ipc_pop_ph3_projected.legend_text: Number of people projected to be in IPC phase 3 or higher April - September 2022. Source: National IPC Technical Working Group

ipc_phase_12_2020.title: IPC Phase Classification (Oct-Dec 2020)
ipc_phase_12_2020.legend_text: Source: National IPC Technical Working Group

ipc_phase_current.title: Current IPC Phase classification
ipc_phase_current.legend_text: IPC phase classification November 2021 – March 2022. Source: National IPC Technical Working Group

ipc_phase_projected.title: Projected IPC Phase classification
ipc_phase_projected.legend_text: Projected IPC phase classification April - September 2022. Source: National IPC Technical Working Group

ipc_perc_ph3_projected.title: Percent of population projected in IPC Phase 3+
ipc_perc_ph3_projected.legend_text: Percent of population projected to be in IPC phase 3 or higher April - September 2022. Source: National IPC Technical Working Group

ipc_perc_ph3_current.title: Percent of population currently in IPC Phase 3+
ipc_perc_ph3_current.legend_text: Percernt of population currently in IPC phase 3 or higher - November 2021 – March 2022. Source: National IPC Technical Working Group

mpi.title: Multidimensional Poverty Index

mpi_headcount.label: Percent of the population in multidimensional poverty

mpi_intensity.label: Intensity of deprivation among the poor

mpi.legend_text: Multidimensional Poverty Index. Source: Alkire, S., Kanagaratnam, U. and Suppa, N. (2020). ‘The Global Multidimensional Poverty Index (MPI) 2020’, OPHI MPI
